alert.note: Alert for Lander Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 14 at 10:35PM MDT until March 15 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Lander Foothills. * WHEN...Until noon Wednesday. The strongest winds will occur between midnight and 6 AM. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Elevated blowover risk for lightweight and high-profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...very light winds will be followed by very sudden, strong westerly winds. Please keep both hands on your steering wheel.
info.instruction: Use caution if you must drive. In a parking lot, park into the wind to minimize the possibility of your car door hitting another parked vehicle.
